page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN MINSTERLEY
page.content: At Minsterley Church we looked at the marriage registers that the vicar brought out for us .We compared jobs in 1845 to 1850 with jobs in 1985 by asking the other children in school what jobs their parents do. Most people in 1845 worked close to Minsterley,nowadays many work in Shrewsbury. In 1845 most local men were either miners at nearby Snailbeach, or farmers or farmworkers.Most girls were domestic servants or stayed at home.Now many of the fathers and mothers work at the creamery or the food factory.
